name: Mortal Recon
description:
Objective

Guide all of the survivors to the exit. Some levels also require that all enemies are destroyed. The Top Right HUD shows completion objective status.

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • SHIFT to Boost
  • RIGHT CLICK to Charge Secondary Fire
  • LEFT CLICK to Fire
  • ESC to access settings for Sound and Mouse
Other Details
  • Drone enemies are made of shield pieces
  • Shield Pieces on some enemy drones will regenerate to a stronger level
  • Destroyed shield scrap can be collected to level up your weapon, which is required to destroy stronger shields
  • A drones brain is set to it's maximum shield level and must be hit to destroy drone
  • Top Left HUD shows current weapon level. It resets on each level
